level_rune_03-01.name: Pyrite Gorge
level_rune_03-01.description: A gorge covered in yellow sand that gives off a metallic sheen in the sunlight. Proceed with caution, for plunderers often lurk where the sun does not reach.

enemy_crowns_2.description: [CrownSlayer] has +70% HP, 75 RES, +4 Weight levels, jump distance +50% and -60% special ability cooldown

enemy_crowns_3.description: [CrownSlayer] has +130% HP, 85 RES, +5 Weight levels, jump distance +50% and -80% special ability cooldown

enemy_ghost_1.description: [Wraith] and [Wraith Leader] has +40% HP, +100% DEF and +20% Movement Speed

enemy_ghost_2.description: [Wraith] and [Wraith Leader] has +60% HP, +180% DEF and +30% Movement Speed

enemy_ghost_3.description: [Wraith] and [Wraith Leader] has +110% HP, +300% DEF and +50% Movement Speed

global_costrecovery_1.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 25%

global_costrecovery_3.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 75%

global_squadnum_1.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 10 Operators

global_squadnum_2.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 7 Operators

global_forbidloc_1.description: 6 tiles on the map will no longer allow units to be deployed upon them

char_exclude_specialsniper_2.description: Sniper and Specialist operators cannot be deployed

char_exclude_guardcaster_2.description: Guards and Caster operators cannot be deployed
